column2: mā rīt fī al-milāḥ man huw ābḥālak
column3: yā dārah qamar fī al-badr al-akmal
lā ṣabr lī lā aṣbr lā aṣbr

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. mashriqī. tawshīḥun li’abī bikrun bn zahr

column2: famā sukinat wal-hamm yawman bimawḍi‘in kadhalik lam yaskun ma‘ al-nghm āilgham

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. mashriqī. tawshīḥ muqtaḍab lābin sahil
